summary.span: 将对象的值转换为不同的数据类型。

span.span: Converts the value of an object into a different data type.
This class cannot be inherited.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更通用的 类不查找移动程序集中的类型名称。The more generic class does not look up the type names in the mobile assembly. 因此， 创建类以在移动相关命名空间中启用类型名称转换。Therefore, the class was created to enable type-name conversion in the mobile-related namespaces.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 强制转换 `data` 为字符串，然后对 其调用方法。This implementation of casts `data` as a string and then calls the method on it. 然后，将返回一个新的结果 。The result, a new , is then returned. 但是，如果结果为 `null` ，则将引发异常。However, if the result is `null`, an exception will be thrown.
